sect1.para: Below is the list of advisories applicable to the NetBSD 3.0.1 release:

itemizedlist.listitem:
A description and resolution procedure for OpenSSL Multiple issues can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2008-007

A description and resolution procedure for OpenSSH Multiple issues can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2008-005

A description and resolution procedure for bzip2(1) Multiple issues can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2008-004

A description and resolution procedure for IPsec in IPv6 Denial of Service can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2008-003

A description and resolution procedure for Endianness issue in fast_ipsec(4) can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2008-002

A description and resolution procedure for file(1) Integer overflow can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2008-001

A description and resolution procedure for BIND cryptographically weak query IDs can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2007-007

A description and resolution procedure for Local panics in display driver code can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2007-006

A description and resolution procedure for IPv6 Type 0 Routing Header can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2007-005

A description and resolution procedure for Insufficient length checking in iso(4) can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2007-004

A description and resolution procedure for BIND multiple denial of service vulnerabilities can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2007-003

A description and resolution procedure for Integer overflows in Render and DBE extensions can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2007-002

A description and resolution procedure for Integer overflow in ktruser() can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2007-001

A description and resolution procedure for libc glob(3) buffer overflow can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-027

A description and resolution procedure for Multiple denial of service issues can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-026

A description and resolution procedure for Multiple information/memory leakage issues can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-025

A description and resolution procedure for systrace(4) integer overflow can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-024

A description and resolution procedure for OpenSSL RSA Signature Forgery can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-023

A description and resolution procedure for BIND recursive query and SIG query processing can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-022

A description and resolution procedure for Integer overflows in CID-keyed font parser can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-021

A description and resolution procedure for Integer overflows in PCF font parsers can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-020

A description and resolution procedure for Malicious PPP options can overrun a kernel buffer can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-019
